User Authentication with igniteR

Source: vignettes/user-authentication.Rmd
user-authentication.Rmd

Introduction

This vignette provides examples of user authentication workflows using the igniteR package.

Signing Up a New User 

# Create a new user account
sign_up_password("user@example.com", "securepassword123")

Signing In 

# Authenticate an existing user
auth <- sign_in_password("user@example.com", "securepassword123")
print(auth$idToken)

Retrieving User Data 

# Get user profile information
user_data <- get_user(auth$idToken)
print(user_data$email)

Password Reset 

# Send a password reset email
reset_password("user@example.com")

Updating User Profile

```r # Update profile update_user( idToken = auth$idToken, displayName = “Updated Name”, photoUrl = “https://example.com/photo.jpg” )
